item.dc:creator: ellen
item.excerpt:encoded: You can use the Baylys theme with a right or left sidebar or with a single-column layout.

item.title: Archive
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.content:encoded:
[smart_archives] [divider]

How to create the Archive page

To include a archive of of all your blog posts you can use the Smart Archives Reloaded WordPress plugin. After the theme installation just include the shortcode [smart_archives] into a new page. In the plugin settings (see Settings/Smart Archives in the Admin panel) you can choose "both" as the Format, so the block and list archive elements both will be displayed.

item.title: Contact
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.content:encoded:
To use forms you can install the Contact Form 7 WordPress plugin. After installation of the plugin just create a new form via the Contact Form 7 settings page and copy/paste the shortcode into a page or post.

Please leave a message

[contact-form-7 id="2085" title="Kontaktformular 1"]

item.title: Portfolio
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.content:encoded: To create a portfolio in the Baylys theme just choose the Portfolio page template in the Page Attributes. The Portfolio will show an overview of all posts included in the category "Portfolio". To show the posts with thumbnails you should include 340x280px thumbnails to each portfolio post. Please set up your thumbnail size in Settings/Media.

item.title: Summer House
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.excerpt:encoded: Tart bear claw sweet roll tart toffee macaroon carrot cake. Biscuit wypas cake sesame snaps jujubes jujubes gummi bears. Sweet pudding chocolate cake. Croissant topping icing brownie pudding faworki.

item.title: Close Up

item.content:encoded: [caption id="attachment_3766" align="alignnone" width="1024"] Lizards are such amazing animals holding so still you almost don't realize them sitting right next to you.[/caption]

item.title: The Chat Post Format
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.content:encoded:
• Ellen: This is a chat protocol
  • Manuel: Wow, this is great. I didn't know I could include something like that into a post!
  • Ellen: Yes, you can but you need to create a ul list with the class of "chat".
  • Manuel: What else do I need to do?
  • Ellen: Then you can create your chat protocoll by adding li elements with the classes "odd" and "even" in return.
  • Manuel: Hey, thanks a lot for your help. I will definitely try that!

item.title: The Audio Post Format
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.content:encoded: [soundcloud url="http://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/37664567" params="auto_play=false&show_artwork=true&color=007bff" width="100%" height="166" iframe="true" /] [divider] You can use the Soundcloud widget with iframe embed code to include audio tracks into your posts. To embed the code it’s best best to use the Soundcloud Shortcode WordPress plugin.

item.title: Nature Photography
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.content:encoded:
Bear claw cupcake powder. Marzipan marzipan halvah sweet sugar plum cheesecake. Wypas tootsie roll oat cake muffin sweet roll sweet roll. Icing cheesecake jelly-o ice cream. Sweet cookie sweet roll gummi bears gummies. Powder faworki pie oat cake jelly beans. Donut marshmallow wafer faworki. Brownie marzipan lollipop applicake tootsie roll. Bear claw gummi bears tart carrot cake donut tootsie roll pastry. Toffee icing macaroon apple pie. Sweet cupcake gummi bears gummi bears fruitcake. Liquorice pudding cupcake sweet pastry sweet roll cheesecake. Caramels muffin tootsie roll cake carrot cake faworki cupcake sugar plum marzipan. Fruitcake wypas marzipan cookie apple pie jelly.

This is a h3 headline

Danish tootsie roll chocolate bar dragée. Faworki marzipan cheesecake jelly beans gingerbread tootsie roll. Chocolate bar croissant topping ice cream tart gummi bears faworki chocolate bar cheesecake. [caption id="attachment_3826" align="alignnone" width="1024"] This is an image caption. You can also add links to your caption text.[/caption] Sweet topping faworki chocolate bar danish bear claw tart chocolate cake. Caramels lollipop icing caramels cheesecake jujubes biscuit chocolate. Tart cupcake macaroon candy canes. Candy canes dessert candy canes jelly-o bonbon cookie pudding candy toffee. Jelly-o lemon drops gummies. Topping carrot cake marzipan. Cookie candy canes toffee topping ice cream bear claw candy macaroon. Danish croissant chocolate. Gummi bears liquorice topping ice cream topping applicake. Cupcake gummies cotton candy jelly cookie wypas. Tiramisu macaroon dessert sweet roll cheesecake chocolate cake. Sweet wafer cake candy canes muffin gingerbread donut.

This is a h4 headline

Chocolate liquorice tootsie roll powder brownie apple pie cake donut. Bonbon cotton candy candy canes chocolate cake muffin apple pie dessert cotton candy apple pie. Jelly dragée gummi bears powder jujubes wafer pie cupcake wypas. Pastry icing sweet roll oat cake bear claw candy sugar plum. Gingerbread pudding jelly-o chocolate bonbon sweet. Gummies candy chupa chups jelly-o. Macaroon sweet roll gummies pudding brownie apple pie bear claw dessert. Lemon drops tootsie roll marzipan faworki fruitcake macaroon liquorice. Marshmallow marzipan gummi bears dragée oat cake sweet powder chocolate cake brownie. Topping apple pie icing. Sweet sugar plum tart jelly beans jelly-o chocolate bar chocolate bar. Cookie halvah chocolate croissant. Carrot cake candy canes cheesecake bonbon liquorice oat cake. Bear claw cupcake powder. Marzipan marzipan halvah sweet sugar plum cheesecake. Wypas tootsie roll oat cake muffin sweet roll sweet roll.

item.title: Testing the Text Elements
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.content:encoded:
Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.

Left align

Nunc aliquam, orci at accumsan commodo, libero nibh euismod augue, a ullamcorper velit dui et purus. Center Align

Phasellus sodales dapibus turpis. Nulla malesuada. In sed quam. Donec sollicitudin convallis nisl. Donec nunc. Suspendisse malesuada libero in nisi. Etiam vitae metus non arcu gravida tincidunt. Duis accumsan purus et orci. Curabitur volutpat. Nulla quis purus id enim dapibus malesuada. Nam egestas luctus arcu. Praesent iaculis massa.

Right Align

Aenean tempor, risus nec eleifend tristique, sem orci aliquam urna, eget iaculis tortor mauris ut lorem. Aenean eu tellus. Sed at mauris at nisl ultricies lobortis. Vivamus lacinia, lorem vel congue facilisis, leo leo sodales leo, vitae euismod velit ante a ligula. Vivamus sit amet turpis ut eros molestie porttitor. Nam erat lacus, auctor vel, dictum a, suscipit sed, orci. Quisque est lorem, facilisis consequat, sagittis a, ullamcorper at, ante. Nullam ultricies gravida dui. Nunc mauris. Quisque neque. Vivamus volutpat, arcu sed venenatis consequat, nulla pede blandit neque, quis ultrices ligula mauris ut leo. Proin iaculis. Pellentesque vulputate magna at lectus. Etiam semper aliquet lectus. Nullam turpis. Vivamus sed lacus. Integer metus arcu, adipiscing sed, vehicula et, vulputate sit amet, massa. Sed lobortis tempus lectus. In lacus. Duis nibh. Donec molestie libero ut neque. Integer turpis ante, facilisis sed, dignissim vitae, consectetuer sed, dui. Sed ultricies.

Header one

Header two

Header three

Header four

Header five
Header six

Blockquote Tests

Blockquote:

Here's a one line quote.

This part isn't quoted. Here's a longer quote:

It’s like a language. You learn the alphabet, which are the scales. You learn sentences, which are the chords. And then you talk extemporaneously with the horn. It’s a wonderful thing to speak extemporaneously, which is something I’ve never gotten the hang of. But musically I love to talk just off the top of my head. And that’s what jazz music is all about.

Stan Getz

And some trailing text.

Table Layout Test

Title Views
About Test User 1 More
260 1 More
Archives 1 More
235 1 More

List Type Tests

Definition List

Definition List Title
This is a definition list division.
Definition
An exact statement or description of the nature, scope, or meaning of something: our definition of what constitutes poetry.
Gallery
A feature introduced with WordPress 2.5, that is specifically an exposition of images attached to a post. In that same vein, an upload is "attached to a post" when you upload it while editing a post.
Gravatar
A globally recognized avatar (a graphic image or picture that represents a user). A gravatar is associated with an email address, and is maintained by the Gravatar.com service. Using this service, a blog owner can configure their blog so that a user's gravatar is displayed along with their comments.

Unordered List (Nested)

  • List item one
    • List item one
      • List item one
      • List item two
      • List item three
      • List item four
    • List item two
    • List item three
    • List item four
  • List item two
  • List item three
  • List item four

Ordered List

  1. List item one
    1. List item one
      1. List item one
      2. List item two
      3. List item three
      4. List item four
    2. List item two
    3. List item three
    4. List item four
  2. List item two
  3. List item three
  4. List item four

It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.

HTML Element Tag Tests

All other HTML tags listed in the FAQ:

Here is the address for Automattic, using the <address> tag:

355 1st Street Suite 202
San Francisco, CA 94105
United States

This is an example of an <anchor> (otherwise known as a link). This abbr. is an example of an <abbr> tag in the middle of a sentence. Here is a TLA showing off the <acronym> tag. What, you want to see some over-sized text using the <big> tag? Can you cite a reference for that, using the <cite> tag? Have you noticed that all of the tag names are displayed in code-form, using the <code> tag? Similarly, I could emulate keyboard text, using the <kbd> text tag, or emulate teletype text using the <tt> tag.

Oh no! I wrote something incorrectly. I'd better delete it, using the <del> tag. I could alternately strike something out using the <strike> tag, or strike something out using the <s> tag. So many choices, which I emphasize using the <em> tag. Just to clarify, this is some inserted text, that I'll highlight using the <ins> tag.

Need to display completely unformatted text, such as a large block of code? Use the <pre> tag, which lets you display:

#container {
	float: left;
	margin: 0 -240px 0 0;
	width: 100%;
}

Want to quote the WordPress tagline Code is Poetry? Use the <q> tag to add quotes around it. This is strong text (otherwise known as bold), using the <strong> tag.

Need to write H2O or E = MC2? You may find great use for subscripting text using the <sub> tag, or for superscripting text using the <sup> tag. Need to call out a variable? Use the <var> tag.

Div and Span Tests

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit.

This is a div with "myclass" class, inside of another div, using the <div> tag.

Sed odio nibh, tincidunt adipiscing, pretium nec, tincidunt id, enim. Fusce scelerisque nunc vitae nisl.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. This is a span inside of a paragraph, using the <span> tag. Sed odio nibh, tincidunt adipiscing, pretium nec, tincidunt id, enim. Fusce scelerisque nunc vitae nisl.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: With the WordPress gallery feature it's really easy to use WordPress as your travel blog, porfolio or as a journal like photography blog. So make it easy for your friends and family to keep up by starting a blog today :)
Why not start a food blog with Baylys today and collect all your favorite recipes?

item.title: Baylys WordPress Theme
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.content:encoded:
Baylys is a modern, minimal WordPress theme with easy-to-use, flexible theme options so you can create your new website or blog in just a few minutes. Baylys has a very light and liberal design so your content can really stand out and get featured the way it should be. You can use Baylys as your new blog theme, show your photography, create a lifestyle or travel blog or even use the theme for your portfolio website. [button link="http://www.elmastudio.de/wordpress-themes/baylys/" size="large" color="blue"]Buy the Baylys WordPress Theme[/button] Or find out more about the theme here.

The Baylys Theme Options

You can customize the Baylys theme easily by choosing the options on the theme options page (see Appearance / Theme Options). Here you can choose your own link and footer background colors, set the layout to a right or left sidebar or a single-column layout, choose a custom footer text, automatic excerpts, upload your own logo image or activate the Responsive Slider or share buttons. [caption id="attachment_3783" align="alignnone" width="840"] Customize your colors on the Baylys Theme Options page.[/caption] To show a header image instead of the slider your can upload your own header images (the width should be 1400px, the height is flexible) just go to the Appearance / Header option. If you want a slighter darker background color or a background pattern (e.g. from ) go to Background option and customize the settings there,

The Layout Options

In the theme options settings you can choose to show your sidebar on the right, on the left or don't show a sidebar at all. In case you don't want to use the sidebar you can still add your widgets to the footer widget area. Next to the layout option on the theme options page you can also choose the page templates Fullwidth, Without Sidebar or Portfolio to create different kind of pages for your site.

Sidebar and Footer Widget Areas

There are two different widget areas in the Baylys theme. You can add widgets to the sidebar and to the four-column footer widget area. Baylys features the custom widgets About, Featured Video, Flickr Preview and Social Links. Of course you can also use all standard WordPress widgets and widgets from the Jetpack by WordPress.com plugin (like the Twitter or Image widget).

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Just writing a few comments here to show you the look of the Baylys theme comments section...
This is a comment reply so you can see the threaded comments :)
One more comment just for testing...

item.title: Baylys Layout Options
item.dc:creator: ellen
item.content:encoded: [caption id="attachment_3794" align="alignnone" width="840"] You can use the Baylys theme with a right or left sidebar or with a single-column layout.[/caption]
